content.question: Which of the following Supreme Court cases is most relevant to this scenario?

choices.label: Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka (1954)
Tinker v. Des Moines Independent Community School District (1969)
Citizens United v. Federal Election Commission (2010)

content.answer: Tinker v. Des Moines Independent Community School District (1969)

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how a required Supreme Court case relates to a relevant political principle, institution, process, policy, or behavior.
